name: SAP HANA Performance: Check for appropriate configuration of the tables_preloaded_in_parallel parameter in X4 VMs
description: The tables_preloaded_in_parallel parameter allows you to control the number of tables loaded at the same time during system startup, providing flexibility for performance optimization.

queries.name: q_preload_setting_check
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE  FROM M_INIFILE_CONTENTS WHERE FILE_NAME='indexserver.ini' AND KEY='tables_preloaded_in_parallel' AND (LAYER_NAME = 'DATABASE' OR LAYER_NAME = 'DEFAULT') AND VALUE > '0' ORDER BY LAYER_NAME ASC LIMIT 1

queries.name: q_cpu_threads_check
queries.sql: select count(*) as VALUE from M_HOST_INFORMATION where KEY='cpu_threads' AND (VALUE='960' OR VALUE='1440' OR VALUE='1920')

actions.description: For optimal table preload performance on X4 series VMs, set tables_preloaded_in_parallel to 32. Experiment with higher values if necessary for your specific workload.
